scripts.install-all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:unit: cd client && npm run test:unit && cd ../server && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:integration: cd client && npm run test:integration && cd ../server && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:coverage: cd client && npm run test:coverage && cd ../server && npm run test:coverage
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
